scenario.name: Call Load Test2
scenario.send: REGISTER sip:[service];transport=[transport] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch]-[$my_dn]-[$reg_repeat];rport Max-Forwards: 70 Contact: <sip:[$my_dn]@[local_ip]:[local_port];transport=[transport]> To: <sip:[$my_dn]@[service];transport=[transport]> From: <sip:[$my_dn]@[service]>;transport=[transport];tag=[pid]SIPpTag00[call_number] Call-ID: [$my_dn]///[call_id] CSeq: [cseq] REGISTER User-Agent: Accession 4.0.0.0 Expires: 600 Allow: INVITE, ACK, BYE, CANCEL, SUBSCRIBE, NOTIFY, REFER, MESSAGE, OPTIONS Content-Length: 0
